title: Aujourd'hui en France: trois jours trois, photographes
brief_description: One of a series of films covering various aspects of the French lifestyle, history and culture. This film studies three French photographers - Jean-Loup Sieff, Robert Doisneau, Bruno Barbey - and their different styles.
